name: settle_auction
attributes: # [doc = " オークションを決済し、入札金を売り手へ払い出しつつ"]
# [doc = " NFT を落札者へ転送する  "]
# [doc = " （`settle_nft_account` の owner チェックを行っていないため、"]
# [doc = "  攻撃者が自分のトークンアカウントを指定するだけで"]
# [doc = "  他人の落札アイテムを横取りできます）"]
body: let raw = ctx . accounts . auction_account . data . borrow () ;
* * ctx . accounts . seller . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += price ;
* * ctx . accounts . auction_funds . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= price ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . escrow_nft_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . settle_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auction_owner . to_account_info () , } ;
transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts ,) , 1 ,) ? ;
msg ! ("Auction settled: paid {} lamports to {}, NFT delivered to {}" , price , ctx . accounts . seller . key () , ctx . accounts . settle_nft_account . key ()) ;

fields.name: auction_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証を全く行っていない生の AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: auction_funds
fields.attribute: # [doc = " lamports 保管用 Escrow アカウント（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: seller
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 売り手の lamports 受取先（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: escrow_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT エスクロー用 TokenAccount（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: settle_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 転送先 TokenAccount（owner チェックを省略）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: auction_owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI 実行用署名者（通常はオークションの預託者）"]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL Token プログラム CPI 用"]
